archimate:BusinessService.name: Lead/Opportunity Management
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
A lead is identified during a customer servicing interaction and the lead captured for subsequent follow-up
General comment:
This service domain provides a resource to capture and progress identified lead/opportunities that may arise during customer relationship development, sales, servicing and fulfillment interactions
Business Purpose : Capture, classify and track a sales lead with an established client for additional priducts or services.
Пример использования:
Это выявлено в ходе взаимодействия по обслуживанию клиента и ведут в плен для последующего
Общее замечание:
Эта область обслуживания предоставляет ресурс для отслеживания и продвижения определенных интересов и возможностей, которые могут возникнуть во время взаимодействия по развитию отношений с клиентами, продажам, обслуживанию и выполнению
деловая цель ::: Захват, классифицировать и отслеживать интерес продаж с установленным клиентом для дополнительных продуктов или услуг.
Lead/Opportunity Management This service domain captures, evaluates and progresses identified lead/opportunities that may arise during customer relationship development, sales, servicing and fulfillment interactions. It will clarify and confirm the customer's interest and check that the product is suitable and the customer eligible prior to initiating the formal offer process (see service domain Customer Offer)
Detailed Summary This service domain captures, classifies and track sales lead/opportunities with established clients for additional products or services. It handles the processing of the opportunity through to the point of formal offer processing.
Executive Summary This service domain captures, classifies and track sales lead/opportunities with established clients for additional products or services. It handles the processing of the opportunity through to the point of formal offer processing.
Examples Of Use A lead is identified during a customer servicing interaction and the lead captured for subsequent follow-up
